qrttoppm

Updated: 25 August 1989
Table Of Contents  

NAME

qrttoppm - convert output from the QRT ray tracer to a PPM image  

SYNOPSIS

qrttoppm [qrtfile]  

DESCRIPTION

This program is part of Netpbm.

qrttoppm reads a QRT file as input and and produces a PPM image as output.  

SEE ALSO

ppm  

AUTHOR

Copyright (C) 1989 by Jef Poskanzer.
